ID_NOT_NULL: ID is not allowed on creation
TRANSITIONS_NOT_EMPTY: Transitions are not allowed on creation
NON_EXISTING_CRITERIA_IN_LIST: Criteria doesn't exist in the list
NON_EXISTING_PROCESSES_IN_LIST: Process doesn't exist in the list
NON_EXISTING_TRANSITIONS_IN_LIST: Transition doesn't exist in the list
USED_CRITERIA: Unable to delete, criteria is in use
USED_PROCESS: Unable to delete, process is in use
DISCONNECTING_TRANSITION_DELETE: Unable to delete transition, this action creates disconnected states
DISCONNECTING_STATE_DELETE: Unable to delete state, this action creates disconnected states
NOT_EMPTY_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS: Transitions related to this state (as Start State) should be deleted first
MORE_THAN_ONE_INGOING_TRANSITION: There are multiple transitions related to this state (as End State), they should be deleted first
ILLEGAL_UPDATE_CHANGES: Such changes are not allowed on update, maybe you want to create new entity?
ILLEGAL_DELETE_TRANSITIONS_NOT_EMPTY: Unable to delete workflow with transitions. Delete transitions first.
